languages.text: "Мы заменим гражданских лиц блюстителями и их родственниками подходящего возраста — переоденем всех в парадную одежду и спрячем под нее оружие. А когда Немезит ударит, его будет ждать жестокое разочарование. Последнее в его никчемной жизни".

"We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."
languages.original_text: "Мы заменим гражданских лиц блюстителями и их родственниками подходящего возраста — переоденем всех в парадную одежду и спрячем под нее оружие. А когда Немезит ударит, его будет ждать жестокое разочарование. Последнее в его никчемной жизни".

traits.locale_text: "We will replace civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes and hide armaments underneath. And when Nemesite strikes, he will be cruelly disappointed. For the last time in his worthless life."

"We will replace civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes and hide armaments underneath. And when Nemesite strikes, he will be cruelly disappointed. For the last time in his worthless life."

"We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their armaments underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

"We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their armaments underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

"We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

"We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

languages.text: "Wir werden die Zivilisten durch Enforcer und ihre Verwandten in angemessenem Alter ersetzen, alle in formelle Kleidung hüllen und ihre Waffen darunter verstecken. Wenn Nemesit angreift, bleibt ihm nur komplette Enttäuschung – zum letzten Mal in seinem wertlosen Leben."
languages.original_text: "We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden die Zivilisten durch Enforcer und ihre Verwandten in angemessenem Alter ersetzen, alle in formelle Kleidung hüllen und ihre Waffen darunter verstecken. Wenn Nemesit angreift, bleibt ihm nur komplette Enttäuschung – zum letzten Mal in seinem wertlosen Leben."

languages.text: «Sustituiremos a los civiles por guardias con parientes de la edad apropiada, los vestiremos a todos con atuendos formales y ocultaremos sus armas debajo. Cuando Nemesitio intente atacar, se llevará una cruel decepción... por última vez en su miserable vida».
languages.original_text: "We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

traits.locale_text: «Sustituiremos a los civiles por guardias con parientes de la edad apropiada, los vestiremos a todos con atuendos formales y ocultaremos sus armas debajo. Cuando Nemesitio intente atacar, se llevará una cruel decepción... por última vez en su miserable vida».

languages.text: 「民間人を、エンフォーサーとその適切な年齢の親族に入れ替えて、全員正装させて、服の下に武器を隠す。ネメサイトが攻撃しようとしても、残酷な失望を味わうというわけ。その無価値な人生で最後の絶望よ」
languages.original_text: "We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

traits.locale_text: 「民間人を、エンフォーサーとその適切な年齢の親族に入れ替えて、全員正装させて、服の下に武器を隠す。ネメサイトが攻撃しようとしても、残酷な失望を味わうというわけ。その無価値な人生で最後の絶望よ」

languages.text: “我们会让年龄合适的执法者替代那些原本参加典礼的平民，给他们穿上正式场合的华服，让他们把武器藏在衣服里。等到涅墨斯特发起袭击的时候，迎接他的只会是冰冷的失望。这一次，将会是他毫无价值的人生中最后的失望。”
languages.original_text: "We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

traits.locale_text: “我们会让年龄合适的执法者替代那些原本参加典礼的平民，给他们穿上正式场合的华服，让他们把武器藏在衣服里。等到涅墨斯特发起袭击的时候，迎接他的只会是冰冷的失望。这一次，将会是他毫无价值的人生中最后的失望。”

languages.text: « Nous remplacerons les civils par des prévôts et leurs proches du même âge et ils cacheront leurs armes sous leurs tenues de cérémonie. Quand Némésite tentera de frapper, il en sera quitte pour une cruelle déception... la dernière de sa misérable vie. »
languages.original_text: "We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."

traits.locale_text: « Nous remplacerons les civils par des prévôts et leurs proches du même âge et ils cacheront leurs armes sous leurs tenues de cérémonie. Quand Némésite tentera de frapper, il en sera quitte pour une cruelle déception... la dernière de sa misérable vie. »

languages.text: "Sivillerin yerine infazcıları ve uygun yaştaki akrabalarını koyacağız. Hepsine resmî kıyafetler giydirip silahlarını kıyafetlerinin altına saklayacağız. Nemezit saldırıya geçmeye çalıştığında da o beş paralık hayatında son kez acı bir hayal kırıklığı yaşayacak."
languages.original_text: "We will replace the civilians with enforcers and their relatives of the appropriate age, dress them all in their formal clothes, and hide their weapons underneath. When Nemesite tries to strike, he will find only cruel disappointment — for the last time in his worthless life."
